name: The Ponys The Science & The Mushroom
name_original: The Ponys The Science & The Mushroom
description:
"Welcome to the ISS station with astronauts ponies !"

"Take a fun adventure and becarefull to the power of the red mushroom in space !"

Programmer : https://shynif.itch.io/

Artist : https://robowarrior.itch.io/

Ressources used :

Audio : AudioCatalyst, WolframTones,Chiptones, sound_fishing music bank.

Arts : Paint.net (for pixel art), Inkscape (for cover).

Game engine used : Game Maker Studio 1.49.

Windows Version here : https://drive.google.com/open?id=1V35ORXUZOZou_nzd5NTd4-dClQOJqHXY
